query: What were the results of my Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test - Consumption assessment on 08-22-2018?
resource_summaries: This record documents a completed procedure for assessing alcohol use disorders using the Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test - Consumption. The assessment was performed on August 22, 2018, and the location was identified as PCP167180.
answer: Based on your medical record, on August 22, 2018, you completed an assessment for alcohol use disorders using the Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test - Consumption. The assessment was performed at PCP167180.
